title: Video: Sleep ∞ Over – Casual Diamond
body:
Austin based songstress **Stefanie Franciotti** aka **Sleep ∞ Over** has just dropped a psychedelic new video for synth dominated track _Casual Diamond_, ahead of her debut full length release _**Forever**_ which will be available towards the end of the month.

It’s a fairly haunting and threatening video, featuring numerous scenes with sharp knives, sinister hooded figures and distressed dancing. There’s a narrative of sorts, yet I can’t quite figure out the exact roles of the various characters, that become distorted amongst the blurred images and eerie shadows. Check out the video below, featuring the heavily **Cocteau Twins** inspired _Casual Diamond_.

[Sleep ∞ Over – Casual Diamond (OFFICIAL VIDEO)](http://vimeo.com/28277648) from [Christine Aprile](http://vimeo.com/christineaprile) on [Vimeo](http://vimeo.com).
